## Government Tender Announcement: Light Support Vehicle (LSVW) Repair and Overhaul Brake Shoes

### Amendment 004

#### Solicitation Number: W8486 249412B

#### Posting Date: May 16, 2024

#### Tender Closing Date and Time: July 28, 2024 (14:00)
An amendment to the original tender announcement, extending the closing date by 20 additional working days, is hereby notified.

#### Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)

#### Procurement Category: Services, Repair and Overhaul (R&O)

#### Published By:

* Department of National Defence (DND)
* Headquarters
* 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2, CANADA

#### Description of Requirement

The Department of National Defence (DND) invites proposals from qualified suppliers for the Repair and Overhaul (R&O) of Light Service Vehicle Wheeled (LSVW) Brake Shoes. The successful bidder will be responsible for the execution of all necessary processes to return the items to a fully serviceable condition, including:

* Disassembly, cleaning, inspection, repairs, overhaul, reassembly, calibration, testing, and packaging & preservation process
* Servicing of Brake Shoes, 80 EA, with 8 EA to be replaced, NSN 2530-15-151-1484

#### Technical Requirements
Refer to the attached solicitation documents for detailed technical requirements.

#### Submission of Proposals

* Electronic submission of proposals by email only to:
DLP53BidsReceiving.DAAT53Receptiondessoumissions@forces.gc.ca
* A pricing schedule and a proposal must be submitted in either official language of Canada.

#### Bidding Documents

* The solicitation package can be accessed through Canada Buys at: https://canadabuys.canada.ca
* Please review the solicitation documents carefully, as all information required for submission is contained within.

#### Contact Information
For any inquiries or requests for technical clarification, please contact the Contracting Authority:
Karen Poirier
karen.poirier@forces.gc.ca
(000) 000-0000

#### Debriefing
Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation process within 15 working days from receipt of the results.
